scripts.createdir: mkdir build && mkdir docs && cd docs && mkdir docs && cd ..
scripts.clean: npm run removedir && npm run createdir
scripts.make: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run rename
scripts.vet: npm run flow && npm run eslint
scripts.audit: echo \"major\" remaining. . : `grep major src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"wasteful\" remaining : `grep wasteful src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"any\" remaining. . . : `grep any src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"mixed\" remaining. . : `grep mixed src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"todo\" remaining . . : `grep todo src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"nextdo\" remaining . : `grep nextdo src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"whargarbl\" remaining: `grep whargarbl src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"comeback\" remaining : `grep comeback src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"fixme\" remaining. . : `grep fixme src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"stochable\" remaining: `grep stochable src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`\\n\"checkme\" remaining. : `grep checkme src/js/nodelike*.js | wc -l`
scripts.qbuild: npm run make && npm run test-verbose && npm run docs && npm run site
scripts.build: npm run make && npm run vet && npm run test-verbose && npm run audit && npm run docs && npm run site
